questions.question: How can you access the state of a component from inside of a member function in python?
What are the advantages of React python?
answers: React can be used on client and as well as server side too
Using React increases readability and makes maintainability easier. Component, Data patterns improves readability and thus makes it easier for manitaining larger apps
React components have lifecycle events that fall into State/Property Updates
React can be used with any other framework (Backbone.js, Angular.js) as it is only a view layer
